name: stream-dom
description: React + Nest + SQLite project that implements a DOM stream from scratch. There is a client whose DOM will be watched, there is a backend to process and store the data and there is a admin to watch the DOM streams. The objective is to show some of my skills with React, Nest, SQLite, TypeScript, styled-components, best practices, code quality, SOLID, DRY, KISS, YAGNI and other principles.
author: victorreis <v.crisostomo.reis@gmail.com>
